A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie redeemed The Force Awakens. It was very different\, but good different. It wasn't the same rehashing of old classics like the rest have been. It went it's own way & took its own direction. It introduced very exciting elements of the force that the others didn't. It redeemed the idea that anyone can be a Jedi\, not only people with \"midichlorians\". It's fresh\, serious\, deep\, fun\, sensual\, & unique.
